issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
In all MAPREDUCE QA runs, '14 ASF Warnings' will mark the entire QA result as '-1 Overall'.
These warnings are from the files generated in tests.

It will be good to see green +1s in QA report than RED -1(s).
fields.summary: Clear ASF Warnings on test data files

comments.body: Uploaded a simple patch to generate the test files in
Uploaded a simple patch to generate the test files in 'already excluded' "target" directory.
Found some more.
